titles.title: 738 O Father Help (timing a little work)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O Father help
Lest our poor love refuse
For Thy redeemed
The life that they would choose
And in our fear of loss
For them or pain
Forget eternal gain

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Teach us to pray
Remembering Calvary
For as the Master
Must the servant be
We see their face
Set toward Jerusalem
Let us not hinder them

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Show us the gain
The golden harvest there
For corn of wheat
That they have buried here
Lest human love
Defraud them and betray
Teach us O God to pray

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Teach us to pray
O Thou who didst not spare
Thy Well-Beloved
Lead us on in prayer
Purge from the earthly
Give us love divine
Father like Thine - like Thine
